short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fun extension for UCI jokes, Dad jokes, and Kanye Quotes. Credit for petr images goes to u/Zottiesaurus, kubool, sarahspng, alyssa

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Petr's Hangout is a passion project that brings enjoyment to its users by creatively and randomly providing jokes, puns and quotes of all kinds whilst simultaneously giving customization features for the popup user interface by way of the color background and various designs of UCI's mascot Petr the Anteater. The extension is subject to continuing development as it is still in its beginning stages with planned features of adding user generated custom jokes, puns, and quotes and the customization of a personal Petr. The project was first created as part of HackUCI's 2021 Hackathon and is built with love and warmth.
